store_info.description_short: Gitea is a community managed lightweight code hosting solution.
description_long: Gitea is a painless self-hosted Git service. It is similar to GitHub, Bitbucket, and GitLab.
The goal of this project is to provide the easiest, fastest, and most painless way of setting up a self-hosted Git service.
hint: At first use, you have to setup the app. It is a save bet to just leave all the settings at their default unless you know what you are doing.
You also have to register your user by clicking on Register in the top right
Multi-user features are not functional yet, only you can use the app.
Integration of this app has not been thoroughly tested, so there might be unforeseen problems.
